metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20190 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in jackson-databind before 2.9.10.7. FasterXML mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
